benchmark_details.name: SynAgent-RAG
benchmark_details.overview: A synthetic dataset designed to enable trainable open-source LLM agents for unified retrieval-augmented generation tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To empower small LLM agents with capabilities to reason and synthesize information for retrieval-augmented generation tasks.

data.source: Synthetic generation using Wikipedia's Vital Articles with questions generated for both single-hop and multi-hop queries.
data.annotation: Annotation includes thoughts, actions, and evidence feedback as part of the reasoning process.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the overlap between predicted and ground truth answers and the correctness of the predicted answer.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in generating accurate responses.
methodology.baseline_results: Competitive performance compared to larger models like GPT-4 and Llama-3-70B-Inst.
methodology.validation: Model validated using multiple retrieval-augmented generation benchmarks.
